---
format:
  html:
    quality: 1
  pdf:
    quality: -1
    comment: "left unless caption or any value of `fig-align` then center"
  typst:
    quality: 0
    comment: "works only if there is no caption, otherwise center"
  dashboard:
    quality: -1
    comment: "always left"
  docx:
    quality: -1
    comment: "always left"
  pptx:
    quality: -1
    comment: "centered or to side of text; caption causes figures to pile up instead of going to new slide"
keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        -
          - "#align\\(right\\)\\[(\r\n?|\n)#box"
        -
          - "#block\\[(\r\n?|\n)#align\\(right\\)\\["
---
